ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Running Heritrix on UBUNTU
ygData.msgSnippet: Also, you might check your JVM.  The default UBUNTU JVM is GCJ IIRC. Currently its missing some features needed by Heritrix. St.Ack

Also, you might check your JVM.  The default UBUNTU JVM is GCJ IIRC.  
Currently its missing some features needed by Heritrix.

St.Ack

Anmol Bhasin wrote:
>
> Hi,
>
> I recently moved to a UBUNTU box from Windows. My Heritirix instance
> is throwing wierd exceptions.
>
> 1. The Dev Environment does not work as the Jasper compiler fails to
> write the .class to the target folder.
>
> 2. When running from Distributions the XMLSettingsHandler complains
> when I try create a New Job.
>
> Any Pointers ????
>
> Anmol
>
>
